import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{useHistory}from"react-router-dom";import{v1 as uuid}from"uuid";import M from'materialize-css';var CreateRoom=function CreateRoom(props){var history=useHistory();var create=function create(){var id=uuid();props.history.push("/room/".concat(id));};useEffect(function(){var token=localStorage.getItem('Token');if(!token){M.toast({html:'Login first',classes:'red'});history.push('/login');}//eslint-disable-next-line
},[]);var logout=function logout(){localStorage.removeItem("Token");history.push('/login');};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(React.Fragment,null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"card"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",{onClick:create},"Create room"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",{onClick:logout},"Logout")));};export default CreateRoom;
